group_1.textLeft: They all went home...

group_1.textRight: You saved our lives...

group_1.textLeft: Now, then, who might you be?
While I do appreciate your efforts@to protect the sacred tree...

group_1.textRight: R-right...

group_1.textLeft: And you must be Battle Shamanesses@as well, correct?

group_1.textRight: How did you...?

group_1.textLeft: Not only were you traveling through@these woods so late at night,
you were also willing to stand against@armed peasants all by yourselves.
Only someone powerful could@think to do such a thing.
Not to mention, I sense reactions@from you similar to mine.

group_1.textRight: I think things will be easier if we're@open and honest with each other.

group_1.textLeft: A small person came out of that book…!@Curiouser and curiouser...

group_1.textRight: Gah... Well, at least she doesn't@seem hostile...
Alright, let me give you the rundown!

group_1.textLeft: My name is Tsuruno Yui!
The girl next to me is Sana Futaba, and the one@coming out of that book is Nemu Hiiragi.
To be honest, we were actually@looking for you…
…Good heavens.
According to you, by accompanying me,@you'll be able to save your dear friend...

group_1.textRight: I know it sounds crazy,@but I swear it's the truth!
So please...can we stay with you,@Princess...?
I know the whole thing about us seeking the concept@of our sort-of god friend must be hard to swallow...

group_1.textLeft: It's completely insane...@But maybe if I use my luck magic...

group_1.textRight: Maybe if we get thrown in the castle prison,@it'll still count as us staying near her...?

group_1.textLeft: I can't tell if you're being optimistic or not...
Very well, then ― we'll all work together@to get what we want.

group_1.textRight: Wait, what?! You really believe us?!

group_1.textLeft: Were you lying?

group_1.textRight: No, it's true!

group_1.textLeft: There we go then. But my strength alone@will not suffice. Might we take a detour?
There's someone else I need to convince,@you see.

group_1.textRight: Sure thing!

group_1.textLeft: No way...! Is this because of@your luck magic, Tsuruno?

group_1.textRight: Perhaps your magic and the [textBlue:Rumor] worked@in tandem to bring things back on track.

group_1.textLeft: Whatever it is, we gotta ride this wave!

group_1.textRight: Before we get ahead of ourselves, however, you@should warn Tsuyu that Sana is invisible to others.

group_1.textLeft: I-I almost forgot! I'll let her know@before it causes an issue...
No way, what a surprise...

group_1.textRight: It was around even in this age...
As this is Suitoku Temple, it seems the Sango they@referred to corresponds to modern-day Sankyo.
Mm?!

group_1.textLeft: Gen'un, this is she.

group_1.textRight: Ah, um...!

group_1.textLeft: There's no need to be so tense.@Tsuyu told me all about you.

group_1.textRight: Phew...

group_1.textLeft: My name is Gen'un.@May I call you Lady Tsuruno?

group_1.textRight: Um, sure...!

group_1.textLeft: Have no fear. He might appear@suspicious, but he's a good person.
I am not suspicious in the slightest.

group_1.textRight: Yes you are.

group_1.textLeft: Hmph... Look, let's get back to@the discussion at hand.
First we need to address@what Tsuyu has told me.

group_1.textRight: So you already know what's up?

group_1.textLeft: You wish to accompany Tsuyu so that@you may save your lost friend.

group_1.textRight: That's right!

group_1.textLeft: I see.
The Amida Buddha takes mercy on@the lives not meant to be lost.
Hence, your friend who has saved@many lives shall be saved in turn.

group_1.textRight: So you're saying...?

group_1.textLeft: Tomorrow, I will accompany Tsuyu to Hokuyo,@where the Mizuna Clan presides,
to arrange with Lord Masatsuna to have@you accompany her at all times.
That's what Tsuyu wants as well.

group_1.textRight: Yes. Thank you for your consideration.
Man, I can't thank you guys@enough for everything!

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle* It's best you get to sleep now@so you'll have energy for tomorrow.

group_1.textRight: Yeah! Thanks again, Princess Tsuyu!
